pkgmetadata.longdescription: html-slacker============Converts HTML to Slack formatted markdownUsage-----Install HTMLSlacker from pip... code:: bash $ pip install html-slackerImport library... code:: python >>> from htmlslacker import HTMLSlackerUse it... code:: python >>> HTMLSlacker('Hello, Slack!').get_output() '*Hello*, _Slack_!'Test it... code:: python $ python setup.py testRequirements------------- Python >= 2.5- htmlLinks-----Repository: https://github.com/codex-team/html-slackerReport a bug: https://github.com/codex-team/html-slacker/issuesPyPI Package: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/html-slackerCodeX Team: https://ifmo.su
